3.45 pm: Afternoon, Josh Halliday here taking over from Matthew Weaver . This just in: Chancellor George Osborne has been defending Andy Coulson .`` Andy Coulson did a good job as director of communications,'' he said. There was never any complaints about how he did that job- which is pretty unique when you look at the people who've done that job in the past. Shortly before the service, surrounded by her husband Mark Kelly, Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and her close friends Nancy Pelosi Debbie Wasserman Schultz ( D-Fla.) and Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), she opened her eyes. She's in her hospital bed. I'm holding her hand, we're talking about how great she is and how inspiring she is. And we're talking about all the fun things we want to do. And she's squeezing my hand and I'm knowing that she's reacting. She's moving her leg and she's moving her arms. And we're getting so excited because we can see that she's really trying so hard to communicate with us.
